item.description:
One of our members suggested this event and it sounds like fun! The cruise starts at 8pm, but boarding begins at 7:30. The cost is $28 and you can buy tickets @ http://www.rockandblu....

More details:
- The cruise is 3 hours total; from 8-11pm. Boarding begins at 7:30.
- There is no food on board, but there is a cash bar.
- No dress code
- Cruises depart from the Boston Harbor Cruise gates at Long Wharf, adjacent to the Long Wharf Marriott and across from the New England Aquarium on Atlantic Avenue.

More details to come!

Corinne & Brad
item.how_to_find_us: Let's meet up in front of Legal Seafoods @ and board together.
item.name: Rock & Blues cruise!
